subject: Re: Hearing Australia website
preview: @heath I've sent you a message on skype, i have questions for this ticket, thanks

full_threads.body: @heath I've sent you a message on skype, i have questions for this ticket, thanks
Here are the attachments the client references https://www.dropbox.com/s/crwt2gq2bjysuf3/hearing%20australia.zip?dl=0

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
@glen

As a priority tomorrow, Can you please action the below updates on this page:

https://phonaklaunch.com.au/hearing-australia-2/

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au


> On 2 Feb 2021, at 4:31 pm, Mazza, Claudia wrote:
>
> Thanks Heath.
>
> A few additions below. I would like to be able to share this with our client no later than Thursday this week. Do you think a final draft then will be possible?
>
> Audeo
> Please add a green box ‘Site for professionals’ - Phonak Audéo™ Marvel Overview | PhonakPro
> Add images:
> Phonak_Mini_Charger_Case_closed
> Audeo_M_13T
> Audeo_M_312
> Audeo_M_312T
> Audeo_M_R
> Audeo_M_RT
> Bolero
> Please add green box ‘Site for professionals’ - Phonak Bolero™ Marvel Overview | PhonakPro
> For both ‘Audeo’ & ‘Bolero’, could we add a button that reads “Additional support material” and add the following materials:
> 11542: Product_Information_Phonak_Marvel_Wireless_Accessories (attached) - Title: Marvel Wireless accessories: Product Information
> Insights: Precalculation (attached)
> Insights: AutoSense (attached)
> New header: Phonak Virto™ Marvel
>
> - Add Professional brochure – Title: Product information – BtB Phonak Audeo Virto
> Download here: https://www.phonakpro.com/content/dam/phonakpro/gc_hq/en/products_solutions/hearing_aid/virto_marvel/documents/product_information_virto_marvel_027-2999.pdf
> Add Consumer pamphlet – Title: Phonak Virto™ Marvel​ Consumer Brochure
> Download here: https://www.phonakpro.com/content/dam/phonakpro/gc_hq/en/products_solutions/hearing_aid/virto_marvel/documents/pamphlet_virto_marvel_028-2082.pdf
> Add images – I will forward in a separate email as they’re too large to attach here.
> Videos
>
> Video applies to all Marvel products, so if we could just have under one banner please (perhaps at the end of Virto?)
> https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:v:/r/personal/nicole_woolfson_unitron_com/Documents/Claudia%20-%20Hearing%20Australia/Movie_POS_BtBtC_Phonak_Marvel_with_subtitles_h264_small_GB_V1.00.mp4?csf=1&web=1&e=5dg7M5
>
> Please delete:
> Datasheets that appears under Naida
> Datasheet & Fitting guide that appears under Sky
> The following images that appear in Sky images (leave under Audeo/Bolero sections only)
> “Pic productshot Bolero M family”
> “Image – charger case”
> Packshot charger case open with Audeo M-RT
> I’m wondering because it’s becoming one long webpage now, whether we should divi-up into product families? I.e. they enter the site and see the 2 green boxes below; when they click, they have access to all content as it currently appears.
>
> New!
> Phonak Audeo™ Marvel
> Phonak Bolero™ Marvel
> Phonak Virto™ Marvel
> Roger
> Phonak Naida™ Marvel
> Phonak Sky™ Marvel
>
> Thanks,
> Claudia.

EXTERNAL MAIL

Hi Claudia,

Apologies, looks like the email didn’t make it through.

Here is the staging link: https://phonaklaunch.com.au/hearing-australia-2/ <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fphonaklaunch.com.au%2Fhearing-australia-2%2F&data=04%7C01%7CClaudia.Mazza%40unitron.com%7Ca10cf78557d944ac45ab08d8c65e83bf%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637477456551599207%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ehi5FsG66SlhOBwVoSpkzqSQoW%2FxYAJBvJBpm2McSgY%3D&reserved=0>

I believe we just need the videos?

Let me know if you receive this and of any changes.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Hi Heath,

Just following up on this webpage draft – I didn’t see anything come through Friday arvo?

Thanks,
Claudia.

Just an update and thank you for the below. We are working on this and will have it ready for you to review by tomorrow afternoon.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire

On 27 Jan 2021, at 12:22 pm, Mazza, Claudia <Claudia.Mazza@unitron.com <mailto:Claudia.Mazza@unitron.com>> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Items in blue below now also attached.

Thanks,
Claudia.

From: Mazza, Claudia
Sent: Thursday, 21 January 2021 2:11 PM
To: 'Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ' <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Subject: RE: Hearing Australia website

Hi Heath,

Further to the below, our go live date has been brought forward. Can we make this 8th February please.

The ‘Marvel feature summary’ guide (highlighted in green on the list below) is now attached.

Across the whole website, can you please remove any references that say ‘Click to order’ – we no longer wish clinics to be doing this.

Thanks,
Claudia.
<image003.jpg>

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Monday, 18 January 2021 11:52 AM
To: Mazza, Claudia <Claudia.Mazza@unitron.com <mailto:Claudia.Mazza@unitron.com>>
Subject: Re: Hearing Australia website

EXTERNAL MAIL
Hi Claudia,

Sure, we will get started on this and let you know once it’s ready to review.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire

On 15 Jan 2021, at 5:23 pm, Mazza, Claudia <Claudia.Mazza@unitron.com <mailto:Claudia.Mazza@unitron.com>> wrote:

Hi Heath,

As mentioned, we’re gearing up for another launch with Hearing Australia and therefore require some updates to the website:https://phonaklaunch.com.au/hearingaustralia/ <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fphonaklaunch.com.au%2Fhearingaustralia%2F&data=04%7C01%7CClaudia.Mazza%40unitron.com%7Ca10cf78557d944ac45ab08d8c65e83bf%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637477456551629192%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=kVikgIot%2Bwnfz8RNJ2k6HziQqB7zwqAKAPMZZfq9IHM%3D&reserved=0>

Go live date will not be until 18th February, though can we please commence edits for approval in the meantime.

The following new material to be placed before existing Phonak Naída™ Marvel & Phonak Sky™ Marvel material (in the following order):

Phonak Audeo™ Marvel​
Scroll to:
Professional brochures
‘Product information BtB Phonak Audeo Marvel’
‘Marvel feature summary guide’
Consumer brochure
Images
‘Packshot charger case open with Audeo M-RT’
Videos

Phonak Bolero™ Marvel​
Scroll to:
Professional brochures
‘Product information BtB Phonak Bolero Marvel’
‘Marvel feature summary guide’ (repeated from above)
Consumer brochures
‘Pamphlet BtBtC Phonak Bolero Marvel’
Images
‘Pic productshot Bolero M family’
Videos

Roger
Professional brochure
BtB Rogerpedia

Videos – to follow
